name: Familiar Spirit
description:
You are a stalwart spirit named Dorbii that is tasked to go to the human world to help a man named Mike think more positively. Help Mike have healthy thoughts to better improve his quality of life and emotional resilience. Sozo the mothman tells you that Mike may be an ally for the world of spirits but he needs your help now. Can you help Mike as his familiar spirit?

Contributors
Stephen Larsen (Director)
Kevin Web (Programming)
Michael House (Programming)
Ben Coombs (Background Art)
Tyler Svedin (Writing)

Would you like to donate? Please go to my Patreon page.
